GR14ps27-43u:5760: saṃyajed gocarīkṛtya bhaktyā suśraddhayā tu vai // Paus_38.172 //
GR14ps27-43u:5768: prayatnena vinā jñānaṃ nyāsakṛd dhyāyināṃ mahat // Paus_38.176 //
GR14ps27-43u:5778: sarvam evaiṣa bhagavān kimu sarvam ataḥ param // Paus_38.181 //
GR14ps27-43u:5779: dhyeyam asya yadā bhāti sā vidyā svātmani sthitā /
GR14ps27-43u:5780: bhaktyā yathocitadhyānād etasmād eva śāntaye // Paus_38.182 //
GR14ps27-43u:5781: evam asya paraṃ rūpaṃ paramaṃ vinibodhatu /
GR14ps27-43u:5782: dhyāyināṃ bhavyabuddhīnāṃ paramānandadaṃ hi yat // Paus_38.183 //
GR14ps27-43u:5791: evaṃ hṛtpuṇḍarīke prāk puṇḍarīkākṣam acyutam // Paus_38.187 //
GR14ps27-43u:5793: bahirvai maṇḍale dhyānaṃ bhavaduḥkhaṃ nayet kṣayam // Paus_38.188 //
GR14ps27-43u:5795: atra sthitaṃ bahirjñeyaṃ mantravyūhaṃ sadoditam // Paus_38.189 //
GR14ps27-43u:5797: tatra tāvat parijñeyā kramaśo vai puroditāḥ // Paus_38.190 //
GR14ps27-43u:5799: tāsāṃ vyaktaṃ kramād dhyānaṃ yathāvat prāk prakāśitam // Paus_38.191 //
GR14ps27-43u:5802: jvālā jyotstnā prabhā yadvat vahner indor vivasvataḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:5805: vyayañjayanti svakaṃ rūpam ābhimānikam uttamam // Paus_38.194 //
GR14ps27-43u:5807: sarvam āpnoti mantrajñaḥ tava bhaktipradaḥ sthitaḥ // Paus_38.195 //
GR14ps27-43u:5808: sāhajaṃ prākṛtaṃ karmabandhaṃ karmātmajaṃ hi yat /
GR14ps27-43u:5809: saṃsthitaṃ hi yathā tāmraṃ dhātorabjaja kālikam // Paus_38.196 //
GR14ps27-43u:5811: kramāt karmātmatattvānām anuvedhaṃ karoti ca // Paus_38.197 //
GR14ps27-43u:5812: bhaktiyuktam asaṃbādhaṃ śaśvad ye cāpnuvanti te /
GR14ps27-43u:5813: pibanti paramaṃ brahma īśaṃ mantrātmanāptaye // Paus_38.198 //
GR14ps27-43u:5815: prayānti mantrasāmarthyād yasmānnāyānti te punaḥ // Paus_38.199 //
GR14ps27-43u:5817: ye pradhānatarā mantrā mūrtayo 'pi jagatprabhoḥ // Paus_38.200 //
GR14ps27-43u:5819: yacchanti padam ātmīyaṃ tat tad akṣayam ācyutam // Paus_38.201 //
GR14ps27-43u:5832: samyag jñātvā tu ṣāḍguṇyaṃ mahimā śāntatā parā // Paus_38.207 //
GR14ps27-43u:5833: prāptum icchati yacchīghraṃ dhīmatā tena pauṣkara /
GR14ps27-43u:5834: pūjanīyaṃ yathāvastham adhyakṣāntaṃ hi kevalam // Paus_38.208 //
GR14ps27-43u:5838: yaḥ punarmūrtipūrvaṃ tu icched guṇagaṇaṃ mahat // Paus_38.210 //
GR14ps27-43u:5842: mukhyatvena tu vai yasya calādyaṃ guṇasaṃgraham // Paus_38.212 //
GR14ps27-43u:5845: ṣaṭkaṃ tu vīryapūrvaṃ vai icchatyārādhanāttu yaḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:5848: tasyārcane tu vihitaṃ bhūyo 'dhyakṣādikaṃ trayam // Paus_38.215 //
GR14ps27-43u:5849: prāgarcanāttu mūrtīnāṃ kevalād arcanāt tu vā /
GR14ps27-43u:5851: mūrtitrayaṃ tadante yat sarvagaṃ yadyapi sthitam /
GR14ps27-43u:5852: tathāpi viśvavibhavaṃ yatsatyaṃ tvātmanā prabhuḥ // Paus_38.217 //
GR14ps27-43u:5854: jāgrad īśvaram adhyakṣaṃ tvayā nāthātmanā saha // Paus_38.218 //
GR14ps27-43u:5858: kuryād vai vidhivanmantrī yathā tadavadhāraya // Paus_38.220 //
GR14ps27-43u:5860: catuṣṭayam idaṃ bhinnaṃ yajanāt siddhikṛt sakṛt // Paus_38.221 //
GR14ps27-43u:5862: yaṃ ya icchatyabhimataṃ parijñānād avāpnuyāt // Paus_38.222 //
GR14ps27-43u:5863: tejaḥ śaktistathā jñānaṃ balaṃ vīryāntam eva hi /
GR14ps27-43u:5864: iṣṭaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ dadyāt mantriṇām idam abjaja // Paus_38.223 //
GR14ps27-43u:5866: yathā jñānaguṇasyoktaṃ sarveṣām evameva hi // Paus_38.224 //
GR14ps27-43u:5868: mokṣabhogāptaye tvevam arcanaṃ vividhaṃ smṛtam // Paus_38.225 //
GR14ps27-43u:5874: prāptaye guṇabhūtānāṃ ṣaṭkayuktaṃ hi yacca te // Paus_38.228 //
GR14ps27-43u:5875: divyānāṃ cāturātmyānāṃ trayaṃ saṃcaritaṃ hi yat /
GR14ps27-43u:5876: trayaṃ guṇamayaṃ cānyat cākārāṇāṃ kramād yajet // Paus_38.229 //
GR14ps27-43u:5884: evaṃ yad adhikāreṇa kuryād ārādhanaṃ hi yaḥ // Paus_38.233 //
GR14ps27-43u:5886: niṣpattau tu kriyāṅgānāṃ hṛdāstrārghyaṃ svamantrarāṭ // Paus_38.234 //
GR14ps27-43u:5890: dhiyā nivedanaṃ teṣāṃ śirasāvanatena yat // Paus_38.236 //
GR14ps27-43u:5892: pūrakeṇa hṛtānāṃ prāk bahiḥsthānāṃ krameṇa tu // Paus_38.237 //
GR14ps27-43u:5896: paramāśritya vai yattu indriyaiḥ saṃyataiḥ saha // Paus_38.239 //
GR14ps27-43u:5898: svaśvāsopahataṃ caiva na bhavet tad yathābjaja // Paus_38.240 //
GR14ps27-43u:5900: kriyāphalānāṃ ca tathā prathamaṃ cācyutārcanāt // Paus_38.241 //
GR14ps27-43u:5902: phalahīnaṃ hi cāmūlād bhavakṣayakaraṃ param // Paus_38.242 //
GR14ps27-43u:5904: te 'pi sanmantrabhaktānāṃ na yacchanti phalaṃ svakam // Paus_38.243 //
GR14ps27-43u:5908: phalam āmuṣmikaṃ caiva aihikaṃ vābjasaṃbhava // Paus_38.245 //
GR14ps27-43u:5909: kṛtvā buddhiniviṣṭaṃ tu japādīn śraddhayā caret /
GR14ps27-43u:5910: bhaktipūtena viprendra tātparyeṇa tu vai saha // Paus_38.246 //
GR14ps27-43u:5911: sāṅgaṃ saparivāraṃ ca iṣṭvaivam ajam avyayam /
GR14ps27-43u:5914: acirākhye pade mantre tantrair abhimatāptaye // Paus_38.248 //
GR14ps27-43u:5915: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaiśvaram /
GR14ps27-43u:5916: sāmarthyād acyutaṃ netrā nāmnā yatsamudāhṛtam // Paus_38.249 //
GR14ps27-43u:5920: vācakāni tu vācyāni yuktānyārādhanāttu vai // Paus_38.251 //
GR14ps27-43u:5925: audayena tu yogena mantrāṇi ca parāt padāt /
GR14ps27-43u:5928: saṃpanne vidhivad yāge punaḥ sarveśvare harau // Paus_38.255 //
GR14ps27-43u:5929: kramāt pravilayaṃ kuryāt sādhakaḥ siddhim icchatām /
GR14ps27-43u:5930: evaṃ niyantṛśaktir vai netrākhyā pārameśvarī // Paus_38.256 //
GR14ps27-43u:5932: bahirvā kamale hārde smartavyā sāmalāntare // Paus_38.257 //
GR14ps27-43u:5936: sahasṛṣṭisvareṇaiva sṛṣṭau sarvaṃ yad īpsitam // Paus_38.259 //
GR14ps27-43u:5937: bhogabījam akhaṇḍaṃ ca pratīpaṃ mantriṇāṃ punaḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:5938: śaśvad ajñānānusiddhaṃ ca saṃprayacchati pūjanāt // Paus_38.260 //
GR14ps27-43u:5940: yathāvad ādau boddhavyaṃ kramān mantraṃ yathāsthitam // Paus_38.261 //
GR14ps27-43u:5941: bījaṃ piṇḍaṃ padākhyaṃ ca tathā mantraṃ salakṣaṇam /
GR14ps27-43u:5942: bhedam etaddhi mantrāṇāṃ phalaṃ bhedena cānvitam // Paus_38.262 //
GR14ps27-43u:5946: āpekṣikaṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ saṃsiddhe niyame sati // Paus_38.264 //
GR14ps27-43u:5950: kevalānāṃ tu ṣaṇṇāṃ vai pañcānām api cecchayā // Paus_38.266 //
GR14ps27-43u:5956: āpyāyane tu vai vauṣaṭ sarvatra kamalodbhava // Paus_38.269 //
GR14ps27-43u:5958: huṃphaṭkāraṃ ca vihitam anyonyaprītaye vaṣaṭ // Paus_38.270 //
GR14ps27-43u:5960: ṛte sapraṇavād vipra namaskārapadāt tu vai // Paus_38.271 //
GR14ps27-43u:5970: natinaḥ praṇavādyā ye tyāgapiṇḍaṃ tathābjaja // Paus_38.276 //
GR14ps27-43u:5974: vikāsayati sad vipra pradāne muktaye 'pi ca // Paus_38.278 //
GR14ps27-43u:5976: vidvān yathoktanītyā tu oṣadhyo mūlam ūrdhvagāḥ // Paus_38.279 //
GR14ps27-43u:5978: kiṃ punastvāgamajñaistu bhaktyā tu vidhipūrvakam // Paus_38.280 //
GR14ps27-43u:5980: teṣāṃ gantā rahaḥ sarvaṃ baddhādyaṃ śabdaḍambaram // Paus_38.281 //
GR14ps27-43u:5983: jñātum icchāmi bhagavan kālabhedena vai saha /
GR14ps27-43u:5987: kālam ekaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha tad vyāpāravaśāt punaḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:5988: bhinnamābhāti kartṝṇāṃ bhagavadbhāvināṃ tu vai // Paus_38.283 //
GR14ps27-43u:5989: nāḍikākalitaṃ yad vai ahorātraṃ tu ṣaḍṛtu /
GR14ps27-43u:5990: pañcadhā viṣamāṃśaistad āprabhātād vibhajya ca // Paus_38.284 //
GR14ps27-43u:5991: brāhmaṃ muhūrtam āsādya mantrajñaḥ prayataḥ śuciḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:5992: śodhayitvā svakaṃ deham āyāmādyair yathoditaiḥ // Paus_38.285 //
GR14ps27-43u:5996: gate dināṣṭame bhāge snānapūrvaṃ samācaret // Paus_38.287 //
GR14ps27-43u:6002: āsādya śayanaṃ paścāt smarenmantreśvaraṃ hṛdi // Paus_38.290 //
GR14ps27-43u:6003: kṣapayitvā niśāṃśaṃ tu utthāya śayanāt tataḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:6004: yogaṃ yuñjīta vai māntraṃ prāgvaddhṛtkamalodare // Paus_38.291 //
GR14ps27-43u:6005: talpam āsādya vai bhūyaḥ prabuddhaḥ kamalodbhava /
GR14ps27-43u:6006: utthāya śayanaṃ tyaktvā tataḥ pūrvoktam ācaret // Paus_38.292 //
GR14ps27-43u:6008: kartavyatvena vai yatra cāturātmyam upāsyate // Paus_38.293 //
GR14ps27-43u:6010: viddhi siddhāntasaṃjñaṃ ca tatpūrvam atha pauṣkara // Paus_38.294 //
GR14ps27-43u:6012: tathā mūrtyantarayutaṃ prādurbhāvagaṇaṃ tu vai // Paus_38.295 //
GR14ps27-43u:6019: mantreṇa bhagavad rūpaṃ kevalaṃ yāgasaṃyutam // Paus_38.298 //
GR14ps27-43u:6021: bhinnair ābharaṇair astrair āvṛtaṃ ca savigrahaiḥ // Paus_38.299 //
GR14ps27-43u:6025: saṃvṛtāḥ parivāreṇa svena svenānvitāstu vā // Paus_38.301 //
GR14ps27-43u:6026: yacchaktyārādhitaṃ sarvaṃ viddhi tantrāntaraṃ tu tat /
GR14ps27-43u:6027: evaṃ nānāgamānāṃ ca sāmānyaṃ viddhi sarvadā // Paus_38.302 //
GR14ps27-43u:6031: saṃkṣiptaṃ saprapañcaṃ ca tṛtīyam ubhayātmakam // Paus_38.304 //
GR14ps27-43u:6033: ye janmakoṭibhiḥ siddhāsteṣām anto 'tra vai smṛtaḥ // Paus_38.305 //
GR14ps27-43u:6034: (ya) tasmāt samyak paraṃ brahma vāsudevākhyam avyayam /
GR14ps27-43u:6035: etasmāt prāpyate śāstrād jñānapūrveṇa karmaṇā // Paus_38.306 //
GR14ps27-43u:6036: siddhāntasaṃjñā viprāsya sārthakā ata eva hi /
GR14ps27-43u:6042: iti śrīpāñcarātre mahopaniṣadi pauṣkarasaṃhitāyāṃ adhikāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma aṣṭātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ //
GR14ps27-43u:6050: anuṣṭup chandobandhena baddhaṃ ślokaśatāt tu yat // Paus_39.2 //
GR14ps27-43u:6051: pādasaṃjñaṃ hi tacchāstraṃ mūlākhyaṃ dviguṇaṃ ca tat /
GR14ps27-43u:6052: yat sārdhaṃ śatasaṃkhyaṃ tu taduddhāram iti smṛtam // Paus_39.3 //
GR14ps27-43u:6054: bahudhā cāpi sarveṣāṃ na saṃjñā calate punaḥ // Paus_39.4 //
GR14ps27-43u:6055: sārdhaṃ śatadvayaṃ yad vai parijñeyaṃ taduttaram /
GR14ps27-43u:6056: bṛhaduttarasaṃjñaṃ ca yad etad dviguṇaṃ bhavet // Paus_39.5 //
GR14ps27-43u:6057: sārdhaṃ sahasrasaṃkhyaṃ tu kalpaṃ tat samudāhṛtam /
GR14ps27-43u:6058: trayasyāsya parijñeyam ūnādhikyaṃ punaḥ śataiḥ // Paus_39.6 //
GR14ps27-43u:6061: ā sahasratrayāt sārdhāt ṣaṭsahastraṃ hi sottaram /
GR14ps27-43u:6063: ye cānye cāntarālaṃ vai śāstrārthenādhikaiḥ śataiḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:6067: kalpaskandhāt tu te sarve parijñeyāḥ krameṇa tu /
GR14ps27-43u:6074: aprameyābhidhānaṃ ca ata ūrdhvaṃ samāgamaḥ // Paus_39.14 //
GR14ps27-43u:6076: tad vai viditavedyānāṃ siddhānāṃ saṃsthitaṃ hṛdi // Paus_39.15 //
GR14ps27-43u:6078: pādāntā yasya vai bhedāḥ kramaśaḥ samudāhṛtāḥ // Paus_39.16 //
GR14ps27-43u:6079: yatra yatrecchayā jātaṃ matabhedena vai saha /
GR14ps27-43u:6082: pramāṇapariśuddhaṃ ca hitam abjaja sātvatam // Paus_39.18 //
GR14ps27-43u:6084: kramāgataśca taiḥ prāptaṃ muktaye bhavināṃ tu vai // Paus_39.19 //
GR14ps27-43u:6087: aprameyaṃ mahat śāstram anantaṃ gaganopamam // Paus_39.20 //
GR14ps27-43u:6091: apṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ viddhi svasya śabdaṃ yathā dvija /
GR14ps27-43u:6092: jñānātmasaṃjñam ātmānaṃ nītaṃ vai svecchayā dvija // Paus_39.22 //
GR14ps27-43u:6096: śabdamūrtiḥ sa bhagavān svecchayā svayametya ca // Paus_39.24 //
GR14ps27-43u:6097: viśrāntaṃ jñānamūrtau tu sa ca saṃkarṣaṇo vibhuḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:6098: svayaṃ vīryam anantaṃ ca mūrchitaṃ jñānamūrtinā // Paus_39.25 //
GR14ps27-43u:6099: guṇaṃ śaktimayaṃ yasya prakāśākhyaṃ tu vigraham /
GR14ps27-43u:6100: ābhimānikam akṣobhyaṃ pradyumnākhyaṃ tu śāśvatam // Paus_39.26 //
GR14ps27-43u:6102: śvasitaṃ vīryamūrtistu praviṣṭaḥ svayameva hi // Paus_39.27 //
GR14ps27-43u:6103: atha vīryātmanā vipra prasaraṃ taijasaṃ mahat /
GR14ps27-43u:6104: janitaṃ cāniruddheti dhatte yo 'naśvaraṃ vapuḥ // Paus_39.28 //
GR14ps27-43u:6106: tyaktam udgāravat śāstraṃ pradyumnena mahātmanā // Paus_39.29 //
GR14ps27-43u:6107: ādāya vidhṛtaṃ tad vai aniruddhātmanā hṛdi /
GR14ps27-43u:6108: guṇavyaktimayaṃ devaṃ vāgīśam asṛjat prabhuḥ // Paus_39.30 //
GR14ps27-43u:6110: anuddhṛtam asandigdhaṃ gataṃ cāvyayatāṃ tataḥ // Paus_39.31 //
GR14ps27-43u:6111: yadaṃśād viditaṃ tad vai jñānamūrte svavigrahe /
GR14ps27-43u:6124: sarahasyaṃ mahābuddhe boddhavyaṃ hi yathārthataḥ // Paus_39.38 //
GR14ps27-43u:6125: iti śrīpāñcarātre mahopaniṣadi pauṣkarasaṃhitāyāṃ āgamanirṇayo nāma ekonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ //
GR14ps27-43u:6130: śāntikaṃ paramaṃ yad vai vyatyayāt saumanasyakṛt // Paus_40.1 //
GR14ps27-43u:6132: nānādharmapratiṣṭhā ca bhavināṃ svargadā ca yā // Paus_40.2 //
GR14ps27-43u:6142: mokṣārtham ācarecchuddhāṃ pratiṣṭhām ācyutīṃ parām // Paus_40.6 //
GR14ps27-43u:6143: sulakṣaṇe tu bhūbhāge gavyair bhaktena vai purā /
GR14ps27-43u:6144: prāgdiksiddhisametaṃ tu vasudhālakṣaṇaṃ ca te // Paus_40.7 //
GR14ps27-43u:6145: sphuṭam uktaṃ pratiṣṭhārthaṃ vijñātavyaṃ tad eva hi /
GR14ps27-43u:6150: uttamaṃ vanayātrāntaṃ tataḥ kuryāt sadeśikaḥ // Paus_40.10 //
GR14ps27-43u:6152: śakune gāgane bhaume cittasaukhyaprade śubhe // Paus_40.11 //
GR14ps27-43u:6153: kiñcid adhvāvaśiṣṭe tu vastavyaṃ ca vanād bahiḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:6154: śubhe grahe 'nukūle ca nakṣatre vāsare 'pi ca // Paus_40.12 //
GR14ps27-43u:6156: ādāya lakṣaṇopetam upalaṃ vai sitādikam // Paus_40.13 //
GR14ps27-43u:6158: vṛkṣaṃ vā lakṣaṇopetam akṣataṃ saralaṃ dṛḍham // Paus_40.14 //
GR14ps27-43u:6159: phalaṃ (?la) puṣpapradaṃ sthūlaṃ sakṣīraṃ vā tadujjhitam /
GR14ps27-43u:6160: nānājāti ca karmaṇyaṃ yajñāṅgānāṃ guṇāvaham // Paus_40.15 //
GR14ps27-43u:6162: kṛtvā visarjanaṃ caiva madhvājyāktena deśikaḥ // Paus_40.16 //
GR14ps27-43u:6164: candanaṃ syandanaṃ tatra tathā surabhicandanam // Paus_40.17 //
GR14ps27-43u:6168: gavyaṃ kapitthaṃ ca tathā hima-tālatamālakam // Paus_40.19 //
GR14ps27-43u:6173: kālākhyaṃ puṣpakūlaṃ ca vairaṃ cānyat phaladrumam /
GR14ps27-43u:6174: phālāsyaṃ bhūrjavṛkṣaṃ ca palāśaṃ kṛtamardakam // Paus_40.22 //
GR14ps27-43u:6182: dviraṣṭakaṃ tu bimbānām evaṃ syād aparaṃ tu vai // Paus_40.26 //
GR14ps27-43u:6184: vihitāḥ kramaśastvete svalpānām ādināṃ mahat // Paus_40.27 //
GR14ps27-43u:6186: niṣkāmānāṃ ca vihitāḥ sarve sarvaphalapradāḥ // Paus_40.28 //
GR14ps27-43u:6198: doṣair aśanipātādyair nāhared dūṣitāni vai // Paus_40.34 //
GR14ps27-43u:6201: devīyapiṇḍikānāṃ ca prāsādānāṃ tathaiva ca // Paus_40.35 //
GR14ps27-43u:6202: yathāvad jñātum icchāmi rathādīnāṃ ca saṃsthitim /
GR14ps27-43u:6203: pramāṇaṃ dhvajadaṇḍānāṃ maṇḍapān maṇḍayanti ye // Paus_40.36 //
GR14ps27-43u:6206: mānam ādau tu sarvatra cintayet saha śilpinā // Paus_40.37 //
GR14ps27-43u:6207: suniveśena saha vai sarvam āpādayet tataḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:6208: yānyuktāni purā brahman vyaktisthānāni vai vibhoḥ // Paus_40.38 //
GR14ps27-43u:6211: tatra tāvat suvarṇādyair lohaiḥ śubhataraiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:6218: ehi (? hīti) śreṣṭhataraṃ vipra arcādeśaṃ sulakṣaṇam // Paus_40.43 //
GR14ps27-43u:6220: yatnena ca samāpādya mantraiḥ saṃskṛtya vaidikaiḥ // Paus_40.44 //
GR14ps27-43u:6226: dravyam āśritya vai baimbaṃ vartate yad idaṃ mahat // Paus_40.47 //
GR14ps27-43u:6228: brahmabhāvanayā nyastaṃ yacchati prātimaṃ phalam // Paus_40.48 //
GR14ps27-43u:6230: pratipattiṃ parāṃ brāhmīm ākāraṃ prati sarvadā // Paus_40.49 //
GR14ps27-43u:6232: pratimānām ato mānaṃ sāṃprataṃ cāvadhāraya // Paus_40.50 //
GR14ps27-43u:6238: catuḥśamāvadhiṃ yāvad atordhvaṃ tu samācaret // Paus_40.53 //
GR14ps27-43u:6240: vardhayed ata ūrdhvaṃ tu sapādaṃ tālameva ca // Paus_40.54 //
GR14ps27-43u:6242: dadyāt tadunnater bhūyo vṛddhyarthaṃ dvādaśāṅgulāt // Paus_40.55 //
GR14ps27-43u:6244: bhūyastadunnater dadyāt tālārdhaṃ tālam eva vā // Paus_40.56 //
GR14ps27-43u:6246: śamam ekaṃ tatordhvaṃ tu unmānārthaṃ tu vardhayet // Paus_40.57 //
GR14ps27-43u:6247: ekaivārcā bhaved anyā vardhayed ata ūrdhvataḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:6254: niṣkāmānāṃ ca kathitaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaphalāptaye // Paus_40.61 //
GR14ps27-43u:6261: mantrāṇām evam abjottha vyaktirdhātvādikī smṛtā // Paus_40.64 //
GR14ps27-43u:6263: pūjyate vividhairbhogair antaḥ saṃpūjanād bahiḥ // Paus_40.65 //
GR14ps27-43u:6264: citraśailamayīṃ muktvā pratimāṃ mahatīṃ ca yām /
GR14ps27-43u:6265: mṛddhātudārujaṃ vipra ghaṭate katham anyathā // Paus_40.66 //
GR14ps27-43u:6267: etāvat pratimāṃ vipra mānamātram udāhṛtam // Paus_40.67 //
GR14ps27-43u:6271: pūjitāmuṣmikīṃ siddhim aihikīṃ ca prayacchati // Paus_40.69 //
GR14ps27-43u:6273: tasmāccalānām arcānāṃ bhinnaṃ pīṭhaṃ śubhapradam // Paus_40.70 //
GR14ps27-43u:6275: mṛṇmayā leśataḥ proktāḥ prāntapīṭhāstu kevalāḥ // Paus_40.71 //
GR14ps27-43u:6277: sāṃprataṃ bhadrapīṭhānāṃ dārujānāṃ ca lakṣaṇam // Paus_40.72 //
GR14ps27-43u:6284: ata ūrdhvaṃ dvihastāntā mānato vitatāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:6285: ādyārcā kramaśo viddhi prādhānyaṃ cottarottaram // Paus_40.76 //
GR14ps27-43u:6296: tadārādhyasya vai kuryād uttareṇa tu sarvadā /
GR14ps27-43u:6297: svātmano dakṣiṇe bhāge tallakṣaṇam athocyate // Paus_40.82 //
GR14ps27-43u:6299: pūrvoddiṣṭena dairghyeṇa ślakṣṇaṃ vā racanānvitam // Paus_40.83 //
GR14ps27-43u:6303: mūlataḥ kaṇṭhadeśād dvau bhāgau bāhyād viśodhya ca /
GR14ps27-43u:6304: tridhāgraṃ mūlataḥ kṛtvā madhyamaṃ vrajanirgatam // Paus_40.85 //
GR14ps27-43u:6306: racanoparyududdiṣṭā kāryā karmāṇinī ? ca sā // Paus_40.86 //
GR14ps27-43u:6313: kuryāt taduttare padmaṃ sacakraṃ kevalaṃ tu vā /
GR14ps27-43u:6314: ānataṃ taṃ bahiḥ kuryād ābhogaṃ vānanaṃ mahat // Paus_40.90 //
GR14ps27-43u:6319: na ca prāsādabhadraṃ ca ekāgram avadhāraya // Paus_40.92 //
GR14ps27-43u:6321: vidheyaṃ caturaśraṃ tu suvṛttaṃ vāmabhāgataḥ // Paus_40.93 //
GR14ps27-43u:6323: stambhaṃ suvṛttaṃ vihitaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vā caturaśrakam // Paus_40.94 //
GR14ps27-43u:6325: bāhulyāt triguṇād dīrghaṃ vihitaṃ stambhaveṣṭanam // Paus_40.95 //
GR14ps27-43u:6333: sragdaṇḍavad vidheyaṃ vā nālaṃ bhadrāsanīyakam // Paus_40.99 //
GR14ps27-43u:6334: pṛṣṭhadeśe tu yad bhaktaṃ vṛttādyaṃ parikalpitam /
GR14ps27-43u:6337: caturbhiḥ kūrmavat kuryāt staṃmbham ādhāram uttamam // Paus_40.101 //
GR14ps27-43u:6339: vistāraṃ tasya tenaiva sārdhena vihitastu vai // Paus_40.102 //
GR14ps27-43u:6341: samaṃ vā mastakoddeśād anupātena saṃkaṭam // Paus_40.103 //
GR14ps27-43u:6343: samāpādyaiva saṃskṛtya prāgvad vai bhavanānvitam // Paus_40.104 //
GR14ps27-43u:6344: saṃnidhīkṛtya mantreśaṃ mantraṃ mokṣāptaye tu vai /
GR14ps27-43u:6345: yaṣṭavyaṃ parayā bhaktyā svaśaktyā vā phalāptaye // Paus_40.105 //
GR14ps27-43u:6347: ete bhedāsya vihitā aṣṭāśrāḥ kamalodbhava // Paus_40.106 //
GR14ps27-43u:6353: iti śrīpāñcarātre mahopaniṣadi pauṣkarasaṃhitāyāṃ bhadrapīṭhalakṣaṇaṃ nāma catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ //
GR14ps27-43u:6357: uktamārgeṇa coddiṣṭaṃ māntraṃ saṃsthāpanaṃ tu vai /
GR14ps27-43u:6358: yathāvad uktaṃ tad ahaṃ jñātum icchāmi sāṃpratam // Paus_41.1 //
GR14ps27-43u:6361: mantrākṛteḥ prabuddhasya guptaṃ kṛtvārcanaṃ hitam // Paus_41.2 //
GR14ps27-43u:6365: bāhulyaṃ ca svavistārāt tṛtīyāṃśasamaṃ smṛtam // Paus_41.4 //
GR14ps27-43u:6367: vibhajya susamair bhāgair adhamaṃ balavatpurā // Paus_41.5 //
GR14ps27-43u:6369: dvir aṣṭasaṃkhyair vitatāstatrādyānāṃ tu madhyataḥ // Paus_41.6 //
GR14ps27-43u:6370: vidheyaṃ ṣaḍbhir aṃśaistu pīṭhaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ samaṃ śubham /
GR14ps27-43u:6371: suvṛttaṃ caturaśraṃ vā svapadmaṃ kevalaṃ tvatha // Paus_41.7 //
GR14ps27-43u:6373: ardhabhāgena bāhulyāt tatsārdhaṃ sakajasya ca // Paus_41.8 //
GR14ps27-43u:6375: vihitaṃ kintu viprendra caturaśrasya kalpayet // Paus_41.9 //
GR14ps27-43u:6377: vartulasya na te kāryāstathaiva kamalodbhava // Paus_41.10 //
GR14ps27-43u:6379: yaduktaṃ cakrapadmābhyām ardhe tuṅgatvam abjaja // Paus_41.11 //
GR14ps27-43u:6381: tad abjaṃ nikhanenmadhyād dvyaṃśaṃ dvyaṃśaṃ samantataḥ // Paus_41.12 //
GR14ps27-43u:6382: khātaṃ bhāgaṃ samaṃ caiva sārdhaṃ dairghyād vidhīyate /
GR14ps27-43u:6383: jalāśrayaṃ tu paritaḥ khātād bhaṅgasamaṃ bahiḥ // Paus_41.13 //
GR14ps27-43u:6389: bhāgadvayaṃ dvayaṃ caiva parito nikhanet kramāt // Paus_41.16 //
GR14ps27-43u:6390: janmāśrayaṃ tu bhāgena sārdhena paritaḥ smṛtam /
GR14ps27-43u:6391: tatordhvam uktamānaṃ yat tatra tad vihitaṃ tu vai // Paus_41.17 //
GR14ps27-43u:6392: vibhajya tat ṣoḍaśadhā madhye bhāgāṣṭakena vai /
GR14ps27-43u:6393: vidheyam akhilaṃ prāgvad bhāgāt pādena vai saha // Paus_41.18 //
GR14ps27-43u:6394: parito nikhaned droṇīṃ brahman bhāgadvayena tu /
GR14ps27-43u:6395: jalāśrayaṃ tu vihitaṃ pādonena dvayena vā // Paus_41.19 //
GR14ps27-43u:6397: navapadmamayīṃ kuryāt saṃsthitiṃ cārcane vibhoḥ // Paus_41.20 //
GR14ps27-43u:6399: ādāya khātapūrvebhyo madhyadeśe tu yojayet // Paus_41.21 //
GR14ps27-43u:6400: vibhaktaṃ bhavate yena kṣetraṃ ced ambujasya ca /
GR14ps27-43u:6401: navānām api padmānām atha mantravarāśritam // Paus_41.22 //
GR14ps27-43u:6403: iti vistīrṇabhāgānāṃ vibhāgaṃ hi yathoditam // Paus_41.23 //

GR14ps27-43u:7386: dravyamūrtau calākhye ca nītam ekātmanā dhiyā // Paus_43.77 //
GR14ps27-43u:7389: sāṅgaṃ salāñchanaṃ caiva kṛtvā abhimataṃ tu vai /
GR14ps27-43u:7398: sthāvarair jaṃgamaiḥ siddhair vividhair mañjarīgaṇaiḥ // Paus_43.83 //
GR14ps27-43u:7424: praṇavena svanāmnā ca natiniṣṭhena tatra vai /
GR14ps27-43u:7425: sannirodhya ca tanmantraṃ bhūlokaṃ pādamākṣiti // Paus_43.96 //
GR14ps27-43u:7428: stambhaṃ ca talapaṃ caiva caraṇaṃ jaṅghameva ca /
GR14ps27-43u:7429: sthānaṃ sthūṇaṃ ca pādaṃ ca paryāyavacanāstvime // Paus_43.98 //
GR14ps27-43u:7434: bhuvanordhvamayīṃ vipra prāsāde 'bhimate tu vai // Paus_43.100 //
GR14ps27-43u:7436: parasparaṃ hi sarvatra vyāpakaiḥ paralakṣaṇaiḥ // Paus_43.101 //
GR14ps27-43u:7437: bhūrlokāṃśaṃ vinā brahmaṃstathānyair ujjhitaṃ hi tat /
GR14ps27-43u:7438: rajastamomahattvācca īṣat sattvaguṇāt tu vai // Paus_43.102 //
GR14ps27-43u:7440: bhūrlokaṃ ca pṛthaksaṃsthaṃ padādyadhvagaṇasya ca // Paus_43.103 //
GR14ps27-43u:7442: nyastavyaṃ jāgradādyaṃ yad ratnanyāse kṛte sati // Paus_43.104 //
GR14ps27-43u:7444: tābhyāṃ taṃ pādato 'nyasya tattveyaṃ kamalodbhava // Paus_43.105 //
GR14ps27-43u:7447: karṇikāyāṃ paraṃ brahma sāmānyaṃ śāśvataṃ vibhum /
GR14ps27-43u:7448: dīkṣākāle yathoddiṣṭā mayā te 'dhvamayī sthitiḥ // Paus_43.107 //
GR14ps27-43u:7449: prāsādānāṃ tu sā siddhiḥ śikhāntānāṃ mahāmate /
GR14ps27-43u:7451: tatrādhyātmaṃ hi bhagavān mūrtaṃ śāntaṃ mama ācyutam /
GR14ps27-43u:7452: sa eva hi virāḍātmā hyadhidaivatamavyayam // Paus_43.109 //
GR14ps27-43u:7461: sarvajñaṃ sarvagaṃ caiva sarvakartāram īśvaram // Paus_43.113 //
GR14ps27-43u:7463: saṃskṛtasya tvato yatnāt sapīṭhasya yathāvidhi // Paus_43.114 //
GR14ps27-43u:7464: devavat sthāpanaṃ tasya vihitaṃ sattvajasya ca /
GR14ps27-43u:7465: sopānapadavī yuktā jagatī yā sulakṣaṇā // Paus_43.115 //
GR14ps27-43u:7466: prāsādasya ca pīṭhaṃ tat parijñeyaṃ yadātmakam /
GR14ps27-43u:7478: dehānte yānti te svargaṃ rājyadoṣair anāvṛtāḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:7479: kālenetya punaḥ svargāt jñānam āsādya nirmalam // Paus_43.122 //
GR14ps27-43u:7480: yena sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥsahaṃ nāśameti ca /
GR14ps27-43u:7481: phalam etāvad uktaṃ hi devālayasamāpanāt // Paus_43.123 //
GR14ps27-43u:7482: savittānāṃ ca bhaktānāṃ nṛpāṇām api padmaja /
GR14ps27-43u:7487: prāguktaṃ labhate kartā susaṃpūrṇaphalaṃ dvija // Paus_43.126 //
GR14ps27-43u:7488: prāsādānāmamantraṃ tu svayaṃ śilpikarāt tu vai /
GR14ps27-43u:7489: yatphalaṃ labhate kartā hemakṣmānnādikaṃ hi tat // Paus_43.127 //
GR14ps27-43u:7491: mṛdā dārviṣṭakādyaistu svalpaṃ vā madhyamaṃ mahat // Paus_43.128 //
GR14ps27-43u:7493: yathoditair guṇair yuktaṃ grāmyaṃ vā kuṭisaṃjñitam // Paus_43.129 //
GR14ps27-43u:7498: kuryād yathāvad uddhāraṃ gurūṇāṃ saṃmatena tu /
GR14ps27-43u:7499: rājā vā tad amātyo 'nyaḥ sadbhaktaśca nṛpājñanayā // Paus_43.132 //
GR14ps27-43u:7501: anantaśayane dārbhe uttānasthaṃ smared vibhum // Paus_43.133 //
GR14ps27-43u:7503: ayutaṃ tvayutārdhaṃ ca śatam ardhādhikaṃ tu vā // Paus_43.134 //
GR14ps27-43u:7507: tarpayitvā ca dehānte samidbhirbahubhiḥ kramāt // Paus_43.136 //
GR14ps27-43u:7509: tathā varṇādhvapadasaṅghaṃ sattābhūtaṃ hi pañcakam // Paus_43.137 //
GR14ps27-43u:7511: bhūtaśaktigaṇaṃ tadvat susūkṣmam aparaṃ hi yat // Paus_43.138 //
GR14ps27-43u:7515: prātimaṃ rakṣa bhagavan mantravṛndaṃ hi cādhvajam // Paus_43.140 //
GR14ps27-43u:7519: tad utthāpanakāle tu kṛtanyāsastu sāṃpratam // Paus_43.142 //
GR14ps27-43u:7522: susaṃmate 'rcite kuṃbhe hemādyair mūrtike tu vā /
GR14ps27-43u:7525: saṃskṛtasya pratiṣṭhānam ācartavyaṃ hi vai punaḥ // Paus_43.145 //
GR14ps27-43u:7529: gobhūhemādikānāṃ ca rāṣṭrasya sanṛpasya ca // Paus_43.147 //
GR14ps27-43u:7531: ato 'nyathā mahān doṣo bhaved vai padmasaṃbhava // Paus_43.148 //
GR14ps27-43u:7535: maṇinā sūryakāntena ādityād analaṃ yathā // Paus_43.150 //
GR14ps27-43u:7541: vrataṃ dvādaśarātraṃ ca svaśaktyā tu samācaret // Paus_43.153 //
GR14ps27-43u:7543: tilāni sahiraṇyāni dānaṃ sarajatāni ca // Paus_43.154 //
GR14ps27-43u:7545: bhojanaṃ tu yathāśakti bahūnāṃ vai mahāmate // Paus_43.155 //
GR14ps27-43u:7547: vased āśritya vai kṣetraṃ prasiddhaṃ siddhasevitam // Paus_43.156 //
GR14ps27-43u:7548: suprasiddhaṃ tu vā tīrtham ekāhaṃ vā dinatrayam /
GR14ps27-43u:7550: kālaṃ muhūrtasaṃjñaṃ yat pratisandhyātrayaṃ tu vai /
GR14ps27-43u:7551: pūrṇam āyatane kuryād divye vā siddhasaṃjñake // Paus_43.158 //
GR14ps27-43u:7552: sati vai bhaktisāmye tu prāyaścittam idaṃ smṛtam /
GR14ps27-43u:7553: sāmānyaṃ sarvavarṇānāṃ manasaḥ prakaṭe tu vai // Paus_43.159 //
GR14ps27-43u:7556: uktaṃ hyetat prakāśe tu atha yāvatprasannatām /
GR14ps27-43u:7557: tāvatkālaṃ japenmantraṃ bhakṣayet pāvanaṃ matam // Paus_43.161 //
GR14ps27-43u:7559: aprakāśe dviṣaṭkārṇaṃ mantram aṣṭākṣaraṃ hi yat // Paus_43.162 //
GR14ps27-43u:7560: ṣaḍakṣaraṃ dvijaśreṣṭha kramāt sandhyātrayaṃ tu vai /
GR14ps27-43u:7561: snānaṃ yathoditaṃ kuryājjaped antarjale sthitaḥ // Paus_43.163 //
GR14ps27-43u:7564: deśakālaṃ tu vai kuryāt pratisnānaṃ tu vai sakṛt /
GR14ps27-43u:7565: pañcāṅgam abhiṣekaṃ ca śeṣaṃ sandhyādvaye hitam // Paus_43.165 //
GR14ps27-43u:7567: adhovāsaḥ parityajya śubham ādāya cāmbaram // Paus_43.166 //
GR14ps27-43u:7579: aṣṭamāṃśojjhitair bhāgair garbhaṃ saptapadaṃ tu vai // Paus_43.172 //
GR14ps27-43u:7583: sāṅgaṃ pañcakaraṃ garbhakṣetraṃ navapadāt tu vai // Paus_43.174 //
GR14ps27-43u:7587: ekādaśakarakṣetrāt garbhaṃ sārdhaṃ ca ṣaṭkaram // Paus_43.176 //
GR14ps27-43u:7591: vidheyā bhittayaścaiva vibhajyaivaṃ tameva hi // Paus_43.178 //
GR14ps27-43u:7593: navāṃśe vabhabhiḥ pūrṇe vidheyaṃ bhagavad gṛham // Paus_43.179 //
GR14ps27-43u:7599: samānīyaṃ hi yatnena mahatā tacca pauṣkara // Paus_43.182 //
GR14ps27-43u:7604: kuryāt pratyaṅmukhaṃ caiva vṛttyarthaṃ ca svatantrake /
GR14ps27-43u:7605: udaṅmukhaṃ ca prāsādaṃ dhanadhānyaṃ prayacchati // Paus_43.185 //
GR14ps27-43u:7610: svāyambhuve vā siddhākhye mukhyakalpam idaṃ smṛtam /
GR14ps27-43u:7613: iṣṭakāṃ ca sudhācūrṇaṃ doṣaiśca pariśodhite // Paus_43.189 //
GR14ps27-43u:7619: tatkṣaṇād eva tatkīrtiḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate 'cyutām // Paus_43.192 //
GR14ps27-43u:7620: bhūlokādyakhilānāṃ ca sthānānām api kiṃ punaḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:7621: vibhavena jagadyoneḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ yaḥ samācaret // Paus_43.193 //
GR14ps27-43u:7622: pitrāsū (dī?) nāṃ gatāsūnām anyeṣāṃ vā karoti yaḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:7623: vaiṣṇavaṃ ca pratiṣṭhānaṃ svaśaktyā vibhavena vā // Paus_43.194 //
GR14ps27-43u:7625: vaiṣṇavaṃ ca paraṃ sthānaṃ tataḥ kālāntareṇa tu // Paus_43.195 //
GR14ps27-43u:7627: ācaranti śubhaṃ yena prāpnuvanti punarbhavam // Paus_43.196 //
GR14ps27-43u:7631: karṣayanti vibhūtiṃ svāṃ kiñcitkālāntareṇa tu // Paus_43.198 //
GR14ps27-43u:7632: kṛtā vai dhvastadoṣāśca nirvighnam amalāṃ punaḥ /
GR14ps27-43u:7635: saṃsthānamānam ākāraṃ na doṣaṃ kālāntarotthitam // Paus_43.200 //
GR14ps27-43u:7639: tathaiva keśavādyā ye anyenānyatareṇa vā // Paus_43.202 //
GR14ps27-43u:7641: evaṃ yad adhikāreṇa kuryād ārādhanaṃ hi yaḥ // Paus_43.203 //
GR14ps27-43u:7643: niṣpattau tu kriyāṅgānāṃ hṛdāstrārghyaṃ samantrarāṭ // Paus_43.204 //
